welcome to the AWS report I'm Jeff bar

it was very exciting and very gratifying
we have worked very hard to to build up

that it's a you know it really is
important to the employees who have

and and to recognize that you know that
they've made a decision for a product
that's so so you know well recognized by
Amazon was was very important to them so
let's start by talking a little bit
about what Trace link is and what it
does trace link provides a platform into
the pharmaceutical industry and that
platform integrates um uh all the
different businesses all the way from
the production of pharmaceutical drugs
from ingredients all the way to patients
and by integrating all the information
we can make the uh full supply chain
much more secure to uh prevent

into this business well fundamentally
there's a set of issues that are
occurring within the far School industry
where uh there are uh a growing amount
of counterfeit drugs uh about 100,000

drugs there's about 7% of the uh the
Global Drug Supply is counterfeit uh in

number of drugs that are out of stock
these are you know Cancer life-saving
drugs and so recognizing that this is a
very important social issue uh we wanted
to come in and really help solve this
problem with the industry and the upside
is that you know by eliminating

actually helps grow the pharmacal

actually help you to to build your

Success because there's no way a company
of our size can service a market as

can have the global reach the scale and
the availability that Amazon provides us
so being a company of 30 uh employees
and and and selling to the number one
pharmaceutical company in the world can
only be possible with AWS now what parts

we can U uh use at any particular time
uh we we started early uh we used you

um now we're going to be using uh Dynamo
uh Cloud search uh fundamentally from

in order to actually provide a solution
uh of our of our type that has to work

uh targeted towards a new type of
Enterprise architecture all right now do
your customers know that they're running

what we learned um especially with one

patient information use information

ews to provide that uh we're actually
leading with the fact that we're on

place we're at in the marketplace is

Partners on board hundreds and hundreds

and number three company in the

90% of of of of the full pharmaceu
Network so now when the next company
joins the value is significantly higher
and the cost is significantly lower for

company now if I understand this
properly your product is used not
specifically within one company but
really in the transaction between two or
more companies is that right that's a
very good point so what we saw was with
the cloud is that there's an opportunity
to have a platform that can go across
companies obviously companies have made
choices whether it's an oracle choice or
a Microsoft choice or an sap choice for
operating their processes within their
four walls effectively but there there
is really no platform that can that can
execute process across companies and so
what we have built on top of AWS is a
platform that basically integrates
processes information and people across
companies so you have to run in the
cloud rather than running on any
particular company's data center it's
absolutely not possible to build a
solution like ours except in the cloud
well I want to congratulate you again
